Blog - page 89

  1. Warrenmusic

    15.03.2009

    I love playing the guitar, but most of the time I need all the help I can get when it comes to learning new songs. Tabs are quite good, although I sometimes find them quite difficult to follow. It doesn't help that most of the tabs I find are seldom correct.

    That's why I love this man. He films himself teaching near perfect renditions of Radiohead songs and posts the videos on YouTube for lazy/tab-illiterate people like me to learn. They're ideal for me because I pretty much only want to play Radiohead songs, and I'm always much better at learning something when it's demonstrated to me a couple of hundred times.

    I've recently been trying to tackle Jigsaw:

  2. We're going to Kenya!

    08.03.2009

    After several weeks and what seemed like tonnes of holiday brochures, we finally booked our holiday today. At the end of September, Steph and I fly to Kenya for two weeks! We're staying in a hotel on the coast for a couple of days, going on a 3 night safari in the Tsavo East & Tsavo West National Parks, then it's back to the hotel for the rest of the holiday. I think it's fair to say I haven't been this excited in years.

  3. Hello!

    03.03.2009

    I was a bit unhappy about being one of the only Web developers who didn't have an up-to-date website, so... tah-dah! Welcome, friend(s). Have a look around if you want, although I'm afraid you won't find much at the moment. Sorry for the lack of content right now but I'll slowly start adding new stuff and a few bells and whistles here and there, just as soon as I decide exactly what I want to do with the site.
